backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining task, project, mind dump, weekly review, and user profile types with authorization, state storage, and query/update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty dailyTasks map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style layer defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Full app router setup with auth/guest guards, onboarding logic, profile-based accent color, and authenticated layout.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing max-width content area, optional bottom nav, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five primary app routes and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/FocusMode.tsx: A full-screen focus timer for a task with pause/resume controls and a mark-done action.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Displays a project with its name, task count, and progress bar, acting as a clickable card.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Shows task title, duration, energy level, and a button to enter focus mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data like profiles, tasks, projects, and mind dumps.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ClarifyPage.tsx: Guides users through clarifying mind dump items by marking them actionable, assigning details, or creating projects.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows today’s tasks with energy filtering and supports entering focus mode and marking tasks done.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity and allows toggling info about authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MindDumpPage.tsx: Provides a textarea to capture unstructured thoughts and save or proceed to clarification.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step onboarding flow and saves the user profile with name and timezone.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile settings including name, timezone, accent color, and energy preference.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Shows the user's projects with task progress and a sheet to view tasks for a selected project.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyResetPage.tsx: Collects weekly reflections, saves them, resets tasks, and navigates back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/theme/accent.ts: Converts a hex color to an OKLCH value and applies it as the primary accent color.
frontend/src/utils/timezone.ts: Detects the user's timezone with Intl API and falls back to UTC.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash without reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind themes, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and includes common plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, version, architectural constraints, required features, and tracked issues for a multi‑user private app.
